title: Walmart cracks into the $1 trillion club
full_text:
Walmart cracks into the $1 trillion club. Walmart's stock closed 3% higher on Tuesday, pushing the retailer's market valuation to $1 trillion as it emphasizes tech and convenience.. Customers shop at a Walmart in Little Rock, Arkansas.Will Newton/Getty Images
  • Walmart's stock price rose about 3% on Tuesday, pushing the retailer's valuation to $1 trillion.
